title: Pregnancy Calculator
description: Calculate your due date and pregnancy tracking
metaDescription: Free pregnancy calculator - Calculate your due date, current week, and trimester. Includes important fetal development milestones.

form.title: Enter Your Information
form.lmpDateLabel: First day of your last period
form.lmpDateHelp: Enter the first day of your last menstrual period
form.dueDateHelp: If your doctor gave you a due date
form.cycleLengthHelp: Average length of your cycle (typically 28 days)

info.title: About the Pregnancy Calculator
info.description: This calculator estimates your due date and tracks your progress throughout pregnancy. Pregnancy typically lasts 40 weeks (280 days) from the first day of your last menstrual period, or 38 weeks from conception.
info.formula: Formula: Naegele's Rule - Due Date = LMP + 280 days (adjusted for cycle length)
info.limitations: Note: This calculator provides estimates. Only 4% of babies are born on their exact due date. 60% are born within one week of the estimated date, and 90% within two weeks. Always consult with your healthcare provider for accurate pregnancy tracking.
